snippet: A defense lawyer made the argument in his opening statement at Laurent Gbagbo’s trial on charges of crimes against humanity.
abstract: Defense lawyer for former Ivory Coast Pres Laurent Gbagbo, who is on trial at International Criminal Court in the Hague for crimes against humanity, says Gbagbo was trying to restore democracy in country when he was ousted by supporters of Pres Alassane Ouattara.
lead_paragraph: A defense lawyer made the argument in his opening statement at Laurent Gbagbo’s trial on charges of crimes against humanity.

headline.main: Ivory Coast: Gbago Was a Defender of Democracy, Lawyer Tells Court
headline.print_headline: Africa; Ivory Coast: Gbagbo Was a Defender of Democracy, Lawyer Tells Court

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
